00076 class MessageQueue
00077 {
00078 public:
00079 
00086         explicit MessageQueue(const string& pathName, char id):
00087                 _rawMessageQueue(pathName,id)
00088         { }
00089 
00097         template <typename T>
00098         void write(const T& obj, long mtype)
00099         {
00100                 _rawMessageQueue.write(&obj,sizeof(T),mtype);
00101         }
00102 
00112         void write(const void* buffer, size_t size, long mtype)
00113         {
00114                 _rawMessageQueue.write(buffer,size,mtype);
00115         }
00116 
00124         template <typename T>
00125         void read(T& obj, long mtype)
00126         {
00127                 _rawMessageQueue.read(&obj,sizeof(T),mtype);
00128         }
00129 
00143         void read(void* buffer, size_t size, long mtype)
00144         {
00145                 _rawMessageQueue.read(buffer,size,mtype);
00146         }
00147 
00152         virtual ~MessageQueue()
00153         { }
00154
